text: "Everyday of My Life" is a 1976 song by Australian band Little River Band and is the only single from their second studio album After Hours. It went to number 29 in Australia. ==Track listings== ;7" (EMI 11116) :Side A. "Everyday of My Life" - 3:40 :Side B. "Days On the Road" - 3:45 Category:1976 songs Category:Little River Band songs
title: Everyday of My Life (Little River Band song)
